General.Name: Banco Bpm SpA
General.Description: Banco BPM S.p.A., together with its subsidiaries, provides banking and financial products and services to individual, business, and corporate customers in Italy. The company operates through Retail, Corporate, Institutional, Private, Investment Banking, Strategic Partnerships, Leases, and Corporate Centre segments. It offers current accounts; home mortgages; personal loans; credit, debit, and prepaid cards; home, personal, assets, and auto and vehicle insurance; and saving and investment products, as well as online trading services. The company also provides business financing, corporate leasing, project and real estate financing, payment and collections, trade and export finance, and digital services, as well as investment and transactional banking. The company was formerly known as Banco Popolare Societa Cooperativa Scarl and changed its name to Banco BPM Società per Azioni in January 2017. Banco BPM S.p.A. is headquartered in Verona, Italy.
